long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Vex 4 is an exhilarating platform game that challenges players of all skill levels. You control a stick figure character, navigating treacherous obstacles and deadly traps to reach the end of each level, collecting coins and rewards along the way.
**Noted: I have a button (unblocked games) to make it easier for users to access and explore more games on my website.
